programme.title: Wimbledon 2016 - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the concluding day's play at the All England Club, where the men's singles final takes centre stage. Defending champion Novak Djokovic faced Roger Federer for the second successive year in 2015's showpiece match, with Djokovic once again claiming victory. The Serbian prevailed 7-6, 6-7, 6-4, 6-3 against the seven-time champion to provide further evidence that he has taken Federer's crown as the world's finest player. Also set to take place today is the mixed doubles final, which was won by Leander Paes and Martina Hingis last year.(n)
